attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: re-think the point system for speeding and other driving offences as it is highly unfair to treat a speeder who may be 6 - 7 mph over the limit keeping up with the flow of traffic to the people seriously speeding say racing or driving dangerously

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
